mapper.select: SELECT f.FAQID, f.GROUPCODE, f.FAQCATEGORY, f.QUESTION, f.ANSWER, c.CODENAME FROM FAQ f JOIN CODEDETAIL c ON f.GROUPCODE = c.GROUPCODE AND f.FAQCATEGORY = c.code WHERE FAQID = #{faqId}

SELECT f.FAQID, c.CODENAME, f.QUESTION, f.CREATEDAT, f.STATUS FROM FAQ f JOIN CODEDETAIL c ON f.GROUPCODE = c.GROUPCODE AND f.FAQCATEGORY = c.code
AND f.question LIKE '%' || #{pageRequestDTO.keyword} || '%'
ORDER BY f.FAQID DESC OFFSET #{pageRequestDTO.offset} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{pageRequestDTO.size} ROWS ONLY

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM FAQ f JOIN CODEDETAIL c ON f.GROUPCODE = c.GROUPCODE AND f.FAQCATEGORY = c.code
AND f.question LIKE '%' || #{pageRequestDTO.keyword} || '%'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FAQ (GROUPCODE, FAQCATEGORY, QUESTION, ANSWER) VALUES (#{groupCode}, #{faqCategory}, #{question}, #{answer})
mapper.update: UPDATE FAQ SET GROUPCODE = #{groupCode}, FAQCATEGORY = #{faqCategory}, QUESTION = #{question}, ANSWER = #{answer}, UPDATEDAT = (SYSTIMESTAMP AT TIME ZONE 'Asia/Seoul') WHERE FAQID = #{faqId}
